title: 37 - Liminal Space
description: This week on My Favorite Murder, Karen and Georgia discuss the murder of Peru's Ruth Thalia Sayas after her appearance on a game show, as well as the murderous reign of sweet little old lady Dorothea Puente in Sacramento, CA.
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
